names.english: the stubborn decoction with three ingredients
names.commonEnglish: The Stubborn Decoction with Three Ingredients

actions: Induces sweating, releases the Exterior, disseminates and facilitates Lung Qi, calms wheezing, stops coughing and warms and disperses Cold pathogens.
With Xing Ren, for Wind-Cold cough and wheezing.
Tonifies Qi, strengthens the Spleen, moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough clears Heat and relieves Fire toxicity.
With Ma Huang and Xing Ren, for coughing or wheezing due to Wind-Cold Attacks the Lungs.

manifestations.pulse: Superficial and slow or Moderate and maybe weak

conditions.name: Cough with a choking sensation in chest
